renewBook(Book, int) - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model.Patron
Renew the loan's due date for a book that is already on loan.
The method changes (renews) the due date of a book that is currently on loan by the patron.
If the book to be renewed is not on loan by the patron, an exception is thrown with a message saying that the book is not on loan to this patron.
RenewBook - Class in bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands
Renews a loan for a specific amount of more days.
It is an implementation of the Command interface and its execute method renews the given patron from the system.
It is created and executed by the CommandParser when the "renew" command is given by the user.
The class has a constructor to intialise the fields needed to execute the command.
RenewBook(int, int) - Constructor for class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.commands.RenewBook
Initialises and creates a RenewBook object using the necessary variables.
RESOURCE - Variable in class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.data.LoanDataManager

returnToLibrary() - Method in class bcu.cmp5332.librarysystem.model.Book
Return the book to the library This function is used to unset any loan information that exists for the book.
